name: jsonschemas
description: JSON Schema definitions for the HMC STAMPLATE project

scripts.lint:jsonld-examples: for f in ./examples/*.json; do npx jsonld-cli lint $f || exit $?; done
scripts.lint:schemas: for f in ./schemas/*.schema.json; do npx ajv-cli compile -s $f || exit $?; done
scripts.lint:schemas-examples: for f in ./schemas/*.schema.json; do npx ajv-cli validate -s $f -d `echo $f | sed -e 's/schema\.//' -e 's/schemas/examples/'` || exit $?; done
scripts.lint: npm run lint:jsonld && npm run lint:jsonld-examples && npm run lint:schemas && npm run lint:schemas-examples
